abilities.name: Sharing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at your opponent's hand. You may use the effect of a Supporter card you find there as the effect of this power. (The Supporter card remains in your opponent's hand.) You can't use more than 1 Sharing Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Milotic is affected by a Special Condition.
